vlive.korean: 그거 뭐냐 이렇게 하는 그게 좀 없나 봐요 붙임성이.. What is it? I'm not very social. 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [MMMTV4] EP7 I am not EASY
vlive.english: What is it? I'm not very social.

vlive.korean: [친화력갑 이민호] 처음에 붙임성이 되게 좋았어요. He was really friendly in the beginning. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [Stray Kids] 이젠 말할 수 있다❗️~슼둥이들의 첫인상~ (Stray Kids’s first impressions)
vlive.english: He was really friendly in the beginning.

examples.korean: She’s a sociable child who’ll talk to anyone. 발음듣기 그녀는 누구에게나 말을 거는 붙임성 있는 아이이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She’s a sociable child who’ll talk to anyone. 발음

examples.korean: Be civil to all; sociable to many; familiar with few; friend to one; enemy to none. (Benjamin Franklin) 발음듣기 모두에게 예의 바르고 다수에게 붙임성 있고 소수에게 친밀하고 한 명에게 친구가 되고 아무에게도 적이 되지 말라. (벤자민 프랭클린, 자기관리명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Be civil to all; sociable to many; familiar with few; friend to one; enemy to none. (Benjamin Franklin) 발음

examples.korean: He is an affable man. 발음듣기 그는 붙임성 있는 사람이다. Neungyule
examples.english: He is an affable man. 발음

examples.korean: He easily became close to people around him because he is so sociable[affable; amiable]. 발음듣기 그는 붙임성이 좋아 주변 사람과 쉽게 친해졌다 Neungyule
examples.english: He easily became close to people around him because he is so sociable[affable; amiable]. 발음

examples.korean: Yes, he's friendly, sort of hail-fellow-well-met. 발음듣기 그래, 그는 친절하고 붙임성 있다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Yes, he's friendly, sort of hail-fellow-well-met. 발음
